body_html:
I have tested your code. I can show the tensorboard as follows:

Most of your codes are correct. The only issue is the path. Try to change the path in the following codes:
writer = tf.summary.FileWriter("/tmp/mnist_logs", sess.graph_def)

Then make sure you can find the path. For example,
writer = tf.summary.FileWriter("C:/Users/Labs/issue1", sess.graph_def)
then use the terminal

Then you can log into the tensorboard by localhost:6006

body:
I have tested your code. I can show the tensorboard as follows:

![ss](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/15058478/26352806/697d3bf2-3f8b-11e7-9e9e-581f58b1e085.PNG)

Most of your codes are correct. The only issue is the path. Try to change the path in the following codes:
writer = tf.summary.FileWriter("/tmp/mnist_logs", sess.graph_def) 

Then make sure you can find the path. For example,
writer = tf.summary.FileWriter("C:/Users/Labs/issue1", sess.graph_def) 
then use the terminal 
 
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/15058478/26353031/4e36a5f8-3f8c-11e7-9feb-a6bc83f0b642.png)


Then you can log into the tensorboard by localhost:6006
